Interface IYRCStoreStatusWindow

  • All Known Implementing Classes:

    public interface IYRCStoreStatusWindow

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods

      void hide()
      Utility method to hide the status window.

      Utility method to clear the current message and icon.

    • Method Detail

      • show

        void show()
        Utility method which shows status window where messages can be displayed.

      • hide

        void hide()
        Utility method to hide the status window.

      • show

        void show(int type,
          java.lang.String text)
        Method displyas the message for the message key passed. Based on the type text properties and icons are read form the theme file. If type=ERROR uses "ErrorColor" as theme and "ErrorIcon" as icon If type=WARNING uses "WarningColor" as theme and "WarningIcon" as icon If type=INFORMATION uses "InformationColor" as theme and "InformtionIcon" as icon
        See Also:
        YRCShellConstants

      • showMessage

        void showMessage(int type,
                 java.lang.String text)
        Method displyas the message passed. Based on the type text properties and icons are read form the theme file. If type=ERROR uses "ErrorColor" as theme and "ErrorIcon" as icon If type=WARNING uses "WarningColor" as theme and "WarningIcon" as icon If type=INFORMATION uses "InformationColor" as theme and "InformtionIcon" as icon
        See Also:
        YRCShellConstants

      • reset

        void reset()
        Utility method to clear the current message and icon. Window will be still visible

      • showError

        void showError(java.lang.String text)
        Method displyas the error message for the message key. Based on the type text properties and icons are read form the theme file.

      • showWarning

        void showWarning(java.lang.String text)
        Method displyas the warning message for the message key. Based on the type text properties and icons are read form the theme file.
